local_intent: Execute a short corrective push (0.1 m at 225°) on the T-block after confirming visibility and alignment, then retreat briefly.
assumptions: Robot is already near the block; height is suitable for immediate alignment
Gripper remains open; no grasp required for pushing
coherence_with_global: Matches the second corrective Push in GLOBAL_BT, preserves yaw 225°, uses detect-or-confirm visibility, aligns before contact, then retreats and waits.
